dhruv-maheshwari.content: Dhruv Maheshwari, one of the co-founders of Hack4Impact, graduated in 2015 from the M&T Program and the Civic Scholars Program. Prior to Hack4Impact, Dhruv was the codirector of Penn Labs, project lead in Social Impact Consulting and a singer in Penn Masala. Dhruv is originally from Marin County, California and his spirit animal is a whale. He and other co-founder Ali Altaf are to blame for the now deprecated Hack4Impact slogan "HACKuna Matata." It's mostly Ali's fault. Today, Dhruv is a product manager at LinkedIn in San Francisco.
